entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rain, 4.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Campbell River Airport 12:48 PM PST Saturday 21 January 2023
Condition: Light Rain
Temperature: 4.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.9 kPa falling
Visibility: 6.4 km
Humidity: 100 %
Dewpoint: 4.2°C
Wind: ESE 8 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of rain. Temperature steady near plus 4.
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending late this afternoon then clearing. Periods of wet snow over higher terrain this afternoon. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 except gusting to 60 near the Strait of Georgia near noon. Wind becoming northwest 20 this afternoon. Temperature steady near plus 4. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Saturday 21 January 2023
